Is that the 3rd chapter of 1st come 1st served, or just another pointless prelude?

@Euphorism When you take being a fucking dickhead as an insult when I'm asking you to "not be" one, that's not on me, dude. And going to someone's twitter for an unwarranted "pleading" over someone's creative work is never a positive thing to do, especially when you're "seriously" considering on doing it. Again, just move on.

@sharpeningrod Meh, don't have twitter don't even know how it works. It's common sense not to "harass" anyone. It's common sense to know the difference between "pleading" and "harassing." I'm sure positive and negative options are expected anywhere. For Example, you calling me a fucking dickhead and intimidating me to not do something is a form of harassment right now.

@Euphorism This is common sense, but in case you haven't been told, don't be a fucking dickhead and harass authors over a fucking doujin. If you don't like what they have to offer, just move on. You don't get a say in their own creations unless they're specifically asking for your input.

Its all for the money and milk honestly. Author was very clever to end chapter 2 on a depressing atmosphere, that would make people beg for another release which would motivitate dramus agency and for him to make another one but since it's NTR where a sun never shines they could never deliver satisfaction to readers because it's just like that. The story has been weak from the very beginning, the execution, approach and dialogue seems ludacris but its NTR doesn't really add up. This will end for the artist with a success in the NTR industry, popularity and money. As for readers, let your imagination run wild.
Just a reminder to stay civil in the comment section. May you be a vanilla lover or just plain ol butthurt, just remember NTR lovers are homies too.

I could go either way. I want the MC boy to Impress me with a comeback, or have the MC girl dive deep into intense gangbang territory. I'm just hoping we get more after the prelude.

@cuck4life I only meant the cover. It's been a trend in WEEKLY Kairakuten to have a single character in progressing states of undress for 3 consecutive volumes covers. So even if Dramus isn't gonna have a chapter on Vol.69, Akina's still gonna be featured.

@sharpeningrod only the next volume will have the second part of the prequel. Chapter 2 is the ending for this. Dramus has said depending on the reception he may be allowed to draw a chapter 3 but this is the part 1 of the prequel. No sequel unless he wants to.
Also, I just noticed that because Akina is the WEEKLY Kairakuten's cover, the next two volumes would also feature her. Can't wait to see how she looks like in Vol.69's cover.
I’m I the only one who loves this story? It’s really well done and the characters are explored to give a greater impact.

Can't wait for that Akifujime's chapter 2. The girl's hot, the bull's an absolute animal, and the cuck isn't even worth thinking about. I'm honestly okay with Dramus milking the fuck out of this. I've jerked it to every single release of ShindoL's TSF series, I can do it for this one too because I really love their artstyle.
Another prelude...hmm ok

Tbh I'm not expecting anything else from 1st come, 1st serve. Aside from the nice art, the story is very repetitive and trashy. Note that I like NTR in general, but this one is just boring at this point, well at least for me tho.

The first part of the chapter of First come, First serve is a prelude anyway. There will be another 16 pages in another magazine but they will be also a prelude. So, in the end, chapter 2 is pretty much the ending of the story.
